1.0 Typography

1.1 Headings

Page headers.

Default styling:

Hello, World

Hello, World

Hello, World

Hello, World

Hello, World
Hello, World
Code Example
<h1>Hello, World</h1>
<h2>Hello, World</h2>
<h3>Hello, World</h3>
<h4>Hello, World</h4>
<h5>Hello, World</h5>
<h6>Hello, World</h6>

1.2 Paragraphs

Paragraph styles.

Default styling:

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Nemo, maxime.

Modifiers

.lead

Lead paragraph.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Nemo, maxime.
Code Example
<p class="{$modifiers}">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Nemo, maxime.</p>

1.3 Anchors

Anchor styles.

Default styling:
This is a link

Modifiers

.active

Active style.
This is a link

Modifiers

.disabled

Disabled style.
This is a link
Code Example
<a href="#" class="{$modifiers}">This is a link</a>
